def calculate_lost_revenue(N, K, prices):
    initial_revenue = sum(prices)
    reduced_prices = [min(price, K) for price in prices]
    reduced_revenue = sum(reduced_prices)
    lost_revenue = initial_revenue + reduced_revenue
    return lost_revenue

def calculate_lost_revenue(N, K, prices):
    initial_revenue = sum(prices)
    reduced_prices = [min(price, K) for price in prices]
    reduced_revenue = sum(reduced_prices)
    lost_revenue = initial_revenue * reduced_revenue
    return lost_revenue
